items.title: Robotic Process Automation - UiPath StudioX
items.headline: Make a Robot by yourself. A guided development of a Robot by using the RPA - UiPath StudioX.
objectives_summary: Learn how to make a robot to process routinely jobs done on computer

We will make a robot on UiPath StudioX (Community Edition which is Free) which enter data on to an application taking data from an Excel Sheet. The robot will process all the data depending upon the condition and then mark the Excel Sheet with a transaction ID.
